participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, often feels like an outsider.
participant_1.background: I grew up homeschooled. I take my emotions out through art. I sometimes need to scream to feel alive. I have a hard time feeling connected with people.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, struggles with loss but finds solace in creativity.
participant_2.background: I live in a house with a yard. Since my dog died I’m incomplete. I’m a mom with two sons and a husband. I am an artist and create with my mind and my hands.

content.text: I am also an artist! I love creating things with my mind and my hands.
I also love creating things. I feel like I can express myself more through art than through words.
I totally agree! I'm not very good at talking about my feelings, but I can express them through my art.
Do you ever have trouble feeling connected with people?
Yes, I do. I feel like I'm on the outside looking in. I don't always feel like I fit in.
Me too! I feel like I'm different from everyone else. I don't always know how to make friends.
I'm glad I'm not the only one who feels that way.
Me too! It's nice to know that there are other people who understand what I'm going through.
I think we should start a club. The "I'm different from everyone else but I'm still awesome" club.
That's a great idea! I would love to be in that club.
Me too! We could have meetings and talk about our feelings and art.
That would be so much fun! I would love to meet other people who understand me.
Me too! I think this is a great idea.
